title: Amulet of magic regeneration
data:
***Version [0.32](/0.32 "0.32")**: This article is up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup*.*

| Type | Jewellery                                                                                                                    |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Amulet of magic regeneration                                                                                                 |
| Icon | [![Amulet of magic regeneration.png](/images/5/5b/Amulet_of_magic_regeneration.png)](/File:Amulet_of_magic_regeneration.png) |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | An amulet that substantially increases the wearer's normal rate of magic regeneration. In order to function, it must first attune itself to the wearer's body with full reserves of magic. |

An **amulet of magic regeneration** increases its wearer's [MP](/MP "MP") regeneration rate by a flat +0.4 MP/turn. This amulet has no effect until worn with full MP, at which point it will "attune" itself to you until removed.

## Strategy

An amulet of magic regeneration is quite welcome for casters, especially those without a source of extra MP. The amulet makes it less likely for you to run out of MP during combat, allowing you to fight longer.

### Tips & Tricks

- If you have [spirit shield](/Spirit_shield "Spirit shield") from a non-amulet source, having this amulet can help. An [amulet of regeneration](/Amulet_of_regeneration "Amulet of regeneration") is better for defense, though.
- For turn-count [speedruns](/Speedrun "Speedrun") and [high score](/High_score "High score") runs that rely on spells, MP regen is often the best amulet to use.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), this amulet gave only +0.25 MP/turn.
- The amulet of magic regeneration was added in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"). This amulet was useless for followers of [Pakellas](/Pakellas "Pakellas"), who don't regenerate MP.

| [Jewellery](/Jewellery "Jewellery") |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |

| [Rings](/Ring "Ring")               | [Dexterity](/Ring_of_dexterity "Ring of dexterity") • [Evasion](/Ring_of_evasion "Ring of evasion") • [Fire](/Ring_of_fire "Ring of fire") • [Flight](/Ring_of_flight "Ring of flight") • [Ice](/Ring_of_ice "Ring of ice") • [Intelligence](/Ring_of_intelligence "Ring of intelligence") • [Magical power](/Ring_of_magical_power "Ring of magical power") • [Poison resistance](/Ring_of_poison_resistance "Ring of poison resistance") • [Positive energy](/Ring_of_positive_energy "Ring of positive energy") • [Protection](/Ring_of_protection "Ring of protection") • [Protection from cold](/Ring_of_protection_from_cold "Ring of protection from cold") • [Protection from fire](/Ring_of_protection_from_fire "Ring of protection from fire") • [Resist corrosion](/Ring_of_resist_corrosion "Ring of resist corrosion") • [See invisible](/Ring_of_see_invisible "Ring of see invisible") • [Slaying](/Ring_of_slaying "Ring of slaying") • [Strength](/Ring_of_strength "Ring of strength") • [Willpower](/Ring_of_willpower "Ring of willpower") • [Wizardry](/Ring_of_wizardry "Ring of wizardry") |
html:
Amulet of magic regeneration

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.32: This article is up to date for the latest stable release of Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup.
Type Jewellery
Name Amulet of magic regeneration
Icon
An amulet that substantially increases the wearer's normal rate of magic regeneration. In order to function, it must first attune itself to the wearer's body with full reserves of magic.

An amulet of magic regeneration increases its wearer's MP regeneration rate by a flat +0.4 MP/turn. This amulet has no effect until worn with full MP, at which point it will "attune" itself to you until removed.

Strategy

An amulet of magic regeneration is quite welcome for casters, especially those without a source of extra MP. The amulet makes it less likely for you to run out of MP during combat, allowing you to fight longer.

Tips & Tricks

  • If you have spirit shield from a non-amulet source, having this amulet can help. An amulet of regeneration is better for defense, though.
  • For turn-count speedruns and high score runs that rely on spells, MP regen is often the best amulet to use.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, this amulet gave only +0.25 MP/turn.
  • The amulet of magic regeneration was added in 0.18. This amulet was useless for followers of Pakellas, who don't regenerate MP.
Jewellery

Rings Dexterity • Evasion • Fire • Flight • Ice • Intelligence • Magical power •
Poison resistance • Positive energy • Protection • Protection from cold • Protection from fire • Resist corrosion • See invisible • Slaying • Strength • Willpower • Wizardry

An '''amulet of magic regeneration''' increases its wearer's [[MP]] regeneration rate by a flat +0.4 MP/turn. This amulet has no effect until worn with full MP, at which point it will "attune" itself to you until removed.

==Strategy==
An amulet of magic regeneration is quite welcome for casters, especially those without a source of extra MP. The amulet makes it less likely for you to run out of MP during combat, allowing you to fight longer. 

===Tips & Tricks===
*If you have [[spirit shield]] from a non-amulet source, having this amulet can help. An [[amulet of regeneration]] is better for defense, though.
*For turn-count [[speedrun]]s and [[high score]] runs that rely on spells, MP regen is often the best amulet to use.
